PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-18742009-11-19NRCAN,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the National Energy Board Cost Recovery Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the NATIONAL ENERGY BOARD COST RECOVERY REGULATIONS to recover NEB costs attributable to regulation of the electricity industry from power line companies, resulting in a more equitable cost recovery structure while retaining the existing attribution and recovery mechanisms, which reflects a separation of export and transmission functions that has occurred in the electricity industry.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0307 Publication Date: 2009-12-09
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the National Energy Board Cost Recovery Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the NATIONAL ENERGY BOARD COST RECOVERY REGULATIONS to recover NEB costs attributable to regulation of the electricity industry from power line companies, resulting in a more equitable cost recovery structure while retaining the existing attribution and recovery mechanisms, which reflects a separation of export and transmission functions that has occurred in the electricity industry.
